misc: Waters the course more than the course sprinklers.
biography: Pekka, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Espoo Ringside Golf and is known for his meticulous approach to the game. Some say he waters the course more than the course sprinklers do!
With six past appearances, Pekka's dedication to the tournament is undeniable. His experience and familiarity with the course dynamics make him a formidable competitor.

Throughout his Hector Trophée career, Pekka has secured one victory, demonstrating his ability to perform under pressure and deliver when it matters most. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his sights are firmly set on future success.

As he prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, marking his seventh appearance, Pekka remains an active and respected figure in the tournament. His passion for the game and commitment to excellence make him a player to watch.
